_source.short_desc: Work Better Together and transform your meetings company-wide with Stormboard's innovative digital workspace!
_source.long_desc:
Stormboard is an all-in-one shared digital transformation workspace and collaborative whiteboard where high-performing professionals and teams hold meetings, project-manage, and perform day-to-day initiatives no matter where they are located.

Identify, capture, prioritize, and act on your finest ideas wherever and whenever they strike. 

Whether you have a physical, remote, or hybrid workforce. Your digital transformation starts here.
_source.pricing_details:
Stormboard offers a free version for individuals or teams with up to 5 members. Business and Enterprise Plans with monthly or annual subscriptions are also available at the following prices:

Business - $10 per user per month when billed monthly (or $8.33 per user per month when billed annually)
Enterprise - Contact for Pricing
_source.target_audience: Stormboard accelerates innovation and problem-solving at scale across your organization - whether your teams are in the office, remote, hybrid, or a combination of all three.

media.caption: Capture, organize, and prioritize ideas in real time
Create instant reports as PDF files, Microsoft Office docs, Google Drive docs and more
Ideate using dynamic Whiteboard stick notes
260+ templates available to choose from - Problem Solving and meeting planning to Agile processes and daily workflow optimizations.

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Diagramming
category_features.definition: Enables schematic data presentation through org charts, mind maps, flowcharts, and process diagrams.

category_features.name: Digital Canvas
category_features.definition: Canvas that can be used to create and collaborate in person and online.

category_features.name: Idea Management
category_features.definition: Encourages users to organize, discuss, improve, and evaluate insights or alternative thinking

category_features.name: Presentation Tools
category_features.definition: Share and present designs

category_features.name: Project Planning
category_features.definition: Organize and schedule tasks and set project goals

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Screen Recording
category_features.definition: Record and save an a video file what is happening on your computer screen

category_features.name: Sketching and Annotation Tools
category_features.definition: Allows sketching and annotation onto digital canvases

category_features.definition: Sample files or documents that could be customized as needed or used as is

category_features.name: Visual Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and visually represent processes within the software

category_features.name: Backlog Management
category_features.definition: The process of evaluating, scheduling, and assigning tasks that have been put on the back burner in favor of higher priority items.

category_features.name: Gantt/Timeline View
category_features.definition: Coordinates and illustrates a project's benchmarks and dependencies

category_features.name: Kanban Board
category_features.definition: Visualization tool to organize and optimize work/tasks

category_features.name: Negative Feedback Management
category_features.definition: Identify, track, and respond to negative feedback

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

category_features.name: Request Management
category_features.definition: Evaluating and prioritizing change requests that are received while working on the project

category_features.name: Resource Management
category_features.definition: Efficient and effective use of an organization's human capital

category_features.name: Retrospectives Management
category_features.definition: Coordinating of stand-up meetings where team members share product updates, feedback, and issues

category_features.name: Status Tracking
category_features.definition: Reporting on changes over time to the state of a request, a prosess, or an object

category_features.name: Supports Scrum
category_features.definition: Ability to accommodate the methodology that incorporates frequent work reassessment and continuous short periods of focused work.

category_features.name: Team Management
category_features.definition: Organizing a group of people to accomplish a task

category_features.definition: Create, save, and re-purpose formatting for emails, forms, and other campaign elements

related_products.short_desc: From ideation to execution, monday.com helps marketing teams plan campaigns on virtual white boards and customizable dashboards.
related_products.features: On monday.com's virtual whiteboard, both large and small teams can collaborate on new campaigns in one convenient location. Then assign tasks to different colleagues on customizable drag-and-drop dashboards so that everyone knows exactly what to do in what priority. From ideation to execution, monday.com allows you to build the solutions you need to turn new concepts into beautifully executed pieces of content.

related_products.short_desc: Confluence is a team workspace where knowledge and collaboration meet. Create, collaborate, and organize your work all in one place.
related_products.features: Confluence is a team workspace where knowledge and collaboration meet. It's a central source of truth for fast-moving companies. Confluence keeps everyone organized and aligned  with everything from meeting notes to strategy docs and IT documentation so they can make better decisions faster and be more responsive to change. Confluence integrates seamlessly with the Atlassian suite of products like Jira Software and Trello, and allows for endless customization with apps from our Marketplace.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 online collaborative whiteboard platform where teams get work done!  Trusted by 95% of Fortune 500 companies.
related_products.features:
Miro is the #1 collaborative whiteboard platform for teams of any size, trusted by over 30 million users worldwide. Miro helps remote teams develop ideas and collaborate like they're in person. 

With over 250 ready-made templates and 80+ powerful integrations like Jira, Asana, Monday.com, MS Teams, and Google Workspace, Miro is perfect for brainstorming, ideating, running team meetings and interactive workshops, mapping, and diagramming. 

Sign up and start collaborating quickly with your team!

related_products.short_desc: Lucidspark is a virtual whiteboard where teams can bring their best ideas to light. Brought to you by the makers of Lucidchart.
related_products.features: Lucidspark is a virtual whiteboard where teams can bring their best ideas to light. Brainstorm and collaborate as a team in real time, no matter where you are. Lucidspark helps people organize notes and scribbles and turn them into presentation-ready concepts. When it's time for next steps, teams can develop workflows and process documents to turn ideas into reality. Features include: integrations, sticky notes, freehand drawing, chat, templates, timer, voting, Breakout Boards.

related_products.short_desc: Ayoa is an all-in-one online whiteboard where you can brainstorm ideas, work together and get things done
related_products.features:
Ayoa takes online collaborative whiteboards to new heights. By seamlessly blending idea generation, task management and team collaboration features, Ayoa goes beyond convention and provides a platform for teams to work together and cultivate knowledge that can be used to drive success.

The Ayoa way of working gives users the speed and fluidity to capture and grow great ideas, instantly action them and develop better working practices. Our flexible features allow teams of any size to do it all

related_products.short_desc: MURAL is a collaborative intelligence company powering effective ideation, innovation, alignment, and team building.
related_products.features: MURAL is a collaborative intelligence company. We create cultures of effective collaboration and increase the innovation capacity of the enterprise - connecting and empowering everyone to deliver business-driving outcomes.

related_products.short_desc: The platform for creative collaboration-where distributed teams meet, work, and make decisions. Get started free!
related_products.features: Bluescape is the platform for creative collaboration. Streamline workflows with all your ideas, assets, iterations, and entire projects into one secure virtual workspace. With built-in voice and video calling, simply gather your team in Bluescape and make quicker decisions. Reduce meetings and finish projects faster in a secure platform trusted by Fortune 100 companies, government agencies, and the world's largest movie studios.

related_products.short_desc: On-premise solution that provides desktop diagramming through sketches of problems, processes, and workflows.
related_products.features: On-premise solution that provides desktop diagramming through sketches of problems, processes, and workflows.

related_products.short_desc: Collect, manage and implement all ideas within your organisation fast and successful with the WhatAVenture Innovation Platform.
related_products.features: The WhatAVenture Innovation Platform offers two modules within one Platform being Idea Management and Idea Incubation. The idea management supports you in collecting ideas for challenges and manage and rate them easily. With a click the chosen ideas are pushed into our Idea Incubator guiding your Entrepreneurs through a validated step-by-step process to develop their ideas up to market readiness, supporting your teams with best practice examples and a virtual help.

related_products.short_desc: Dojoit is the fastest online whiteboard collaboration tool.
related_products.features: Dojoit is the fastest online whiteboard collaboration tool. Use our patent-pending "one pen" experience to seamlessly switch between typing and drawing. Our built-in templates help you accelerate brainstorming, mind-mapping, design thinking, visual note-taking, strategy development, and ideation. Invite participants with a single click - our intuitive and minimalist experience gets everyone up and running in minutes.

related_products.short_desc: We provide next gen video collaboration services to enable company experts to work virtually side-by-side with anyone needing help.
related_products.features:
Help Lightning is a B2B software company specializing in remote assistance.

We provide next generation video collaboration services that enable a company's experts to work virtually side-by-side with anyone needing help, anywhere in the world. 

Our cloud-based solution applies augmented reality features, including the merging of two video streams and the use of 3D annotation to improve real-time communications and solve difficult problems.

Our software works with all your existing devices.

similar_products.short_desc: Freehand is the first online whiteboard made for everyone. Trusted by 100% of the Fortune 100. Best-in-class security and integrations.
similar_products.features:
InVision Freehand is the first online whiteboard truly made for everyone.

Trusted by 100% of the Fortune 100 with best-in-class security and integrations with Microsoft Teams and Slack.

From product managers and marketers to recruiters and engineers - Freehand's simplicity makes everyone feel at home from the first time they try it. Whether you're brainstorming, planning, or facilitating a meeting, Freehand allows you to spend more time contributing than figuring out how to contribute.

similar_products.features:

The Ayoa way of working gives users the speed and fluidity to capture and grow great ideas, instantly action them and develop better working practices. Our flexible features allow teams of any size to do it all

similar_products.short_desc: Diagram software for drawing flowcharts, org charts, mind maps, network diagrams, floor plans, business model diagrams and many more.
similar_products.features: MyDraw is developed and supported by Nevron Software  a global leader in Diagramming, Text Processing and Data Visualization solutions. MyDraw is an advanced diagramming software and vector graphics drawing tool. This diagram software includes powerful features to help you create flowcharts, org charts, mind maps, network diagrams, floor plans, family tree diagrams, general business diagrams, drawings, invoices, scorecards, and others. It is the right solution to your project needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Allows teams to collaborate and visualize ideas on a digital canvas.
similar_products.features: Allows teams to collaborate and visualize ideas on a digital canvas.

similar_products.short_desc: Simple, free, and easy to use whiteboard collaboration solution.
similar_products.features: Simple, free, and easy to use whiteboard collaboration solution.

similar_products.short_desc: The tool for organizing creative projects
similar_products.features: Organise all your ideas in one place and make sense of them as they grow.

similar_products.short_desc: Conceptboard boosts productivity and collaboration: The virtual workspace enables efficient teamwork regardless of time and place.
similar_products.features: Conceptboard  is a virtual collaboration tool, that boosts productivity and improves team collaboration. Conceptboard supports you in a wide range of use cases: from interactive presentations to product development to meetings or internal trainings. Work with teams, clients, and external partners across the globe. Get projects done with remote teams or in the same room, work in real-time or asynchronous. Conceptboard integrates seamlessly into existing workflows and speeds up your collaboration.

similar_products.short_desc: Free unlimited online whiteboards for team collaboration and personal use
similar_products.features:
Organize your work and personal space with Weje. Store and manage all your notes, tasks and images online. Go on from planning vacations with your family together to getting all things done with your team.

Collaborate in real-time with anyone. Weje is a perfect solution for distributed/remote teams that allows working together efficiently on shared whiteboards. Go on knowledge management with the help of mind maps, ready-made templates, flexible cards and lists. 

Free for personal use.

similar_products.short_desc: Project scheduling software specifically developed to meet the needs of the construction industry.
similar_products.features: Powerproject is the preferred scheduling software of construction professionals throughout the world, Available in stand-alone, enterprise and cloud versions it combines easy-to-use drag and drop functionality with powerful feature rich capability. It includes an integrated BIM module for 4D planning by combining a 3D model and project plan in one application, plus a free viewer for easy sharing throughout the build process. It has an accompanying app for progress reporting via mobile devices

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Diagram software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Diagram tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Diagram software enables schematic data presentation through org charts, mind maps, flowcharts, and process diagrams.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Higher Education software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Higher Education tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Higher Education software helps universities and higher learning institutions with student recruitment, admissions, faculty and course management, and financial aid. Often higher education software include tools like a student information system, faculty accreditation reporting, eLearning and LMS options, alumni engagement, and document management. Learning institutions looking for higher education software may also be interested in Classroom Management software, Gradebook software, School Administration software, School Accounting software, Grant Management software, Scholarship Management software, and Admissions software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Idea Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Idea Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Idea Management software provides all employees or members of an organization with a platform for sharing ideas to benefit the organizational mission. This type of software allows companies to solicit information and encourage a collaborative environment for employees. Additionally, vendors, partners, customers and investors can share ideas, allowing companies to collect, sort, and evaluate ideas from the outside workforce, often with strategic goals in mind. Idea Management software is related to Project Management software, Workflow Management software, and Task Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top K-12 software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of K-12 tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: K-12 software streamlines operations and student management of public and private kindergartens as well as primary, middle, and high schools.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Management software automates task assignment, resource allocation and milestone tracking for all phases of a project. Project Management tools and systems may take one of several approaches: collaborative, when multiple people work on a project; top-down, when one person works on a project at a time; or integrated, when multiple aspects of the organization are involved. There are a variety of project management systems and tools that have been designed to fit your project needs. Project Management software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, Web Collaboration software and Workforce Management software. Find the best project management software for your organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Planning software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Planning tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Planning software allows businesses to create timelines for project completion, allocate resources, assign tasks, and budget for project-related expenses.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_products.short_desc: Microsoft Visio is a diagramming solution that helps visualize data-connected business process flows, empower remote teamwork, and more
related_products.features: Microsoft Visio is a diagramming solution with a robust library of templates and shapes, data connectivity capabilities, and integrated collaboration tools to empower remote workers and teams anywhere. Create impactful visualizations using provided shapes and starter files.  Edit diagrams stored online simultaneously with colleagues through a web browser to work with others anywhere securely and effortlessly. Even connect diagrams to real-time data to make decisions quickly.

related_products.short_desc: The intelligent diagramming application that empowers teams to clarify complexity, align their insights, and build the future.
related_products.features:
Our online diagramming application makes it easy to create and share professional diagrams. 
From system design, to brainstorming, to project management, we support all of your communication and collaboration needs. Thats why millions of users choose Lucidchart.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 online whiteboard platform for collaborative mapping and diagramming.
related_products.features:
Miro is #1 collaborative whiteboard platform for teams of any size, trusted by over 25 million users worldwide. 
Try Miro to create robust maps and diagrams that elevate knowledge and align everyone on the vision. Ideal for diagramming complex systems, processes, and customer journeys.
Map processes, systems, user flows, site maps, and more. Build from scratch on an easy-to-use, infinite canvas, or leverage over 250 templates to get a head start.

related_products.short_desc: Drive engagement by building a culture of connection and appreciation with shareable, dynamic org charts and communication tools.
related_products.features: Do in minutes what used to take hours with Pingboard's customizable org chart and employee experience suite. Your employees can scan the org chart to find what they're looking for at a glance, or dive deeper into individual employee profiles to learn more about the people they're working with. Drive engagement by building a culture of connection and appreciation with Pingboard's shareable, dynamic org charts and communication tools.

related_products.short_desc: Graphics utility that makes it simple to create professional-looking diagrams and charts.
related_products.features: EdrawMax is an all-in-one diagram software that makes it simple to create professional-looking flowcharts, organizational charts, network diagrams, business presentations, building plans, mind maps, science illustration, genogram, UML diagrams, workflows, program structures, web design diagrams, electrical engineering diagrams, directional maps, database diagrams and more. It is available for Windows, macOS, Linux and online.

related_products.short_desc: Cacoo is an easy to use online diagram and collboration tool for creating sitemaps, flowcharts, mind maps, wireframes, mockups, UML
related_products.features:
Brainstorm and prioritize ideas with team members in the same office or around the world. Cacoo is a diagram tool for creating flowcharts, mind maps, org charts, mockups, and more. 
Our features include real time collaboration; powerful app integrations including Google Drive, Confluence, Visio, and more; vast amount of templates & shapes; and easy sharing options including embedding, links, and exports.

related_products.short_desc: Transforms brainstorming ideas, strategic thinking and business information into blueprints for action.
related_products.features:
Work faster, better, and more connected with MindManager, a portfolio of visual productivity tools that helps you and your team transform unstructured ideas and information into dynamic maps, diagrams, and more. 

MindManager offers a variety of diagram types, starting with typical mind maps, concept maps, org charts, flowcharts, and swim lanes, all the way up to Venn and onion diagrams, matrices, and Kanban boards. 

Depend on MindManager to provide the clarity you and your team need.

related_products.short_desc: Online diagramming software for any type of diagram building, editing, and sharing.
related_products.features:
Gliffy's diagramming applications make it easy to communicate and collaborate at the speed of your ideas. Whether you're using Gliffy in Confluence and Jira or jumping into our standalone diagramming tool, Gliffy Online, you'll find an intuitive way to draw diagrams.

Drag and drop your way to professional-looking flowcharts, UML diagrams, entity-relationship diagrams, and more in just a few clicks. Use a template to make a mind map or concept map while brainstorming. Visit gliffy.com today!

related_products.short_desc: On-premise solution that provides desktop diagramming through sketches of problems, processes, and workflows.
related_products.features: On-premise solution that provides desktop diagramming through sketches of problems, processes, and workflows.

related_products.short_desc: iGrafx platform captures and connects critical business operations for detailed process mining, analysis, modeling, and optimization.
related_products.features: We believe that process is at the center of everything. The iGrafx Business Transformation platform turns your processes into a portfolio of valuable assets. iGrafx provides the most collaborative & comprehensive platform for BPMN, RPA, Workflow Automation, Customer Journey, GRC, and more. Do you have a global enterprise? No problem! We have successfully scaled to support companies with over 100k global users and the largest global enterprise requirement. And never any upload or file size limits

similar_products.short_desc: empower? makes MS Office easier, more efficient and brand compliant. empower? is the most used Microsoft Office add-in for corporations
similar_products.features: empower? is a solution for Microsoft that elevates and streamlines working with PowerPoint, Word, Excel, and Outlook. Create properly formatted presentations, documents, spreadsheets and emails quickly. Build documents based on robust templates and building-blocks - instantly searchable in a centralized library, online and offline. Host the software on-premise or in the cloud and use it with Office 365, Office for Windows, Office for Mac, PowerPoint Online, and Microsoft Teams.

similar_products.short_desc: A powerful JavaScript diagramming library that helps developers and companies of any size build advanced visual applications.
similar_products.features:
JointJS is a powerful JavaScript diagramming library that helps developers and companies of any size build advanced visual and No-Code applications.

It comes in two versions: open-source (JointJS) with limited features and professional (JointJS+), which extends the features of JointJS and offers a wide range of customizable features, ready-to-implement demo applications and white-glove support.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based tool designed to help tax practitioners capture and visualize relationships between entities through shareable diagrams.
similar_products.features:
Blue J Diagramming is the diagramming solution built for tax practitioners, by tax practitioners. 

Blue J Diagramming allows accountants, tax lawyers, and other tax practitioners to create complex entity-relationship diagrams that are attractive and clear to share with colleagues and clients alike. 

Specialized for tax practitioners, allows for collaboration with colleagues, and provides a significant head start with diagram templates on a range of tax areas.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based diagramming tool that helps create, share, track and manage diagrams through drag & drop functionality and templates.
similar_products.features: draw.io is a flowchart solution designed to help developers, network admins, IT analysts, and designers use drag-and-drop functionality to create and publish diagrams. The system enables professionals to add toggle layers with customizable URLs and align texts within the shapes. Businesses can utilize the inbuilt layout shapes to automatically organize flow charts, mind maps, and tree diagrams. The platform also lets teams automatically generate and export diagrams to PDF files.

similar_products.short_desc: Open productivity suite that allows users to produce letters, multimedia presentations, diagrams, 3D illustrations, and more.
similar_products.features: Open productivity suite that allows businesses of all sizes to create mathematical equations, manage databases, produce letters, multimedia presentations, diagrams, 3D illustrations, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Creately combines visual collaboration & diagramming, workflow & project management, wiki and note taking together.
similar_products.features: Creately is a work management platform that runs on a smart visual canvas. Teams use it to brainstorm, plan, manage projects, and capture knowledge in a single space. It connects and centralizes work items from multiple apps, docs, and people in a central location. This makes it easier for teams to ideate, map out processes, add in-depth details, and build the systems to execute the processes right inside Creately.

similar_products.short_desc: Diagram software for drawing flowcharts, org charts, mind maps, network diagrams, floor plans, business model diagrams and many more.

MyDraw is an advanced diagramming software and vector graphics drawing tool. This diagram software includes powerful features to help you create flowcharts, org charts, mind maps, network diagrams, floor plans, family tree diagrams, general business diagrams, drawings, invoices, scorecards, and others. It is the right solution to your project needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy multi-platform software to make any diagram. Intuitive tools and templates, with simple collaboration and sharing features.
similar_products.features: Powerful diagramming software including thousands of templates, tools and symbols. Easily create flowcharts, org charts, floor plans, CAD drawings, projects & schedules, network diagrams, charts & graphs, wireframes and so much more. Full MS Office, Box, Jira, GSuite, Confluence and Trello integrations. Import, modify and export Visio files and stencils. Simple sharing and collaboration features and multi-platform access make SmartDraw the superior diagramming solution.

similar_products.short_desc: Diagram software that enables designers to create website wireframes, electrical systems, family trees, and maps of software classes.
similar_products.features: Diagram software that enables designers to create website wireframes, electrical systems, family trees, and maps of software classes. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Artificial Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Artificial Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Artificial Intelligence software mimics human behavior and learning patterns.  It can be utilized in a variety of business areas, from customer service and sales (in the form of chatbots) to data analysis and IT tasks automation.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Process Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Process Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Process Management software enables companies to model, deploy, optimize, and manage business processes. Business Process Management solutions offer a collaborative, continuous conduit through which to institute changes and distribute information throughout an enterprise. Organizations use these applications to coordinate their business environment, schedule and synchronize changes, test the effectiveness of new strategies, and institutionalize best practices. Business Process Management software is related to Systems Integration software and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Visualization software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Visualization tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Visualization software helps companies present information in an organized, graphical and easily searchable manner. This type of software is designed to integrate with existing applications and use data to build visual presentations. For related software solutions see Business Intelligence software, Knowledge Management software and Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Idea Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Idea Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Idea Management software provides all employees or members of an organization with a platform for sharing ideas to benefit the organizational mission. This type of software allows companies to solicit information and encourage a collaborative environment for employees. Additionally, vendors, partners, customers and investors can share ideas, allowing companies to collect, sort, and evaluate ideas from the outside workforce, often with strategic goals in mind. Idea Management software is related to Project Management software, Workflow Management software, and Task Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Presentation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Presentation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Presentation software helps ministers, salespeople, marketing employees, and other professionals with creating and conducting presentations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Wireframe software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Wireframe tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Wireframe software helps designers and developers plan user interfaces for applications and websites. With web prototyping tools, wireframe software allows users to sketch out their projects, receive feedback, and collaborate with other members of the design team. For additional help with your UI/UX design, look at Application Development software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.
